text: Analysis of <extra_id_0> BMP-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> messenger RNA ( mRNA ) expression
Endogenous expression of the <extra_id_0> BMP-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene was examined by reverse transcription - polymerase chain reaction .
Total RNA was isolated using Absolutely RNA ( TM ) RT-PCR Miniprep Kit ( Stratagene Europe , Amsterdam , Netherland ) according to the manufacturers instructions .
Quantification of the isolated total RNA was achieved by using spectrophotometric OD260 measurements .
Equal amounts of RNA were then reverse transcribed to cDNA with TaqMan ( R ) Reverse Transcription Reagents ( Applied Biosystems , Foster City , CA , U.S.A ) .

To measure mRNA expression of <extra_id_0> BMP6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Id1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - <extra_id_0> Id4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> PGK1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> PCR were carried out with TaqMan ( R ) universal master mix .

text: Primers and probes were provided by Assay-on-Demand ( Applied Biosystems ) .
PCR reactions were carried out in a final volume of 25 mul ( <extra_id_0> BMP-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) or 20 mul ( ID1 ) .
The cDNA added to each reaction was equivalent to the input of 20 ng of total RNA .

The gene expression was quantified using the standard curve method ( <extra_id_0> BMP6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , or the comparative CT method ( <extra_id_0> Id1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) as described in ABI7700 User Bulletin 2 ( Applied Biosystems ) .

text: The expression was then normalized to the expression level of <extra_id_0> PGK1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
<extra_id_0> PGK1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was chosen , because it has been shown to have low expression variability among lymphocyte specimens [ 56 ] .

text: Expression levels in B cells were then related to the expression levels in Ramos cells .
